message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
My turn, Alice. How about a slightly better split for me this time? 55/45.
Bob, time is running out. My offer stands - 60/40. Don't be greedy!
Alice, let's be realistic.  50/50 is the fairest split. Take it or leave it.
Okay Bob, I'm compromising. 55/45, take it before inflation eats away at our profits!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm giving you one more chance. 51/49. It's a good deal considering the inflation.
